title: Municipal Stadium (Sherbrooke)
text: Municipal Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Sherbrooke">Sherbrooke</a>, <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> and hosted three <a href="Football%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics">football</a> games during the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>. It holds 4,000 people.
